derivation.yuyuan_name: late 19th cent.: from Sanskrit svastika, from svasti 'well-being', from su 'good' + asti 'being'

entry.tran: 卐字饰，万字饰(印度的一种吉祥标志，同时也曾是德国纳粹党的党徽)
entry.def: A swastika is a symbol in the shape of a cross with each arm bent over at right angles. It is used in India as a good luck sign, but it was also used by the Nazis in Germany as their official symbol.

means.word_mean: 1. the official emblem of the Nazi Party and the Third Reich; a cross with the arms bent at right angles in a clockwise direction
